job.title: IT Project Manager
job.description:
Computer Enterprises, Inc. is looking for a strong Project Manager who has a background in software development and has the ability to lead development teams.
CEI’s Managed Services practices focuses on long-term support efforts across development, testing and infrastructure management arenas.  Our practices seek to bring the right pricing model by extending our solutions across our delivery centers in the US, India, Peru, and Spain.
Responsibilities will include the following:
•	Personal billing (as Project Manager) commensurate with size of practice / pipeline
•	Manage (and hiring) team members within geographic area
•	Training, certification, and productivity of team members
•	Assist local sales group with growing the practice through pre-sales support (technical credibility, assessments, qualification)
•	Proposal management and development: verify approach, create estimates, plan, marketing
•	Team member scheduling (works with PMs / other Ops Dirs / VP)
•	P&L review and oversight for the delivery group in the region
Desired Skills:
•	Previous experience managing offshore delivery teams
•	As at least 8 years’ experience as a project manager
•	The ability to navigate conflict, errors, and unexpected roadblocks with poise and purpose.
•	Exposure to application management and ITIL
•	Must be a team leader people are inspired to follow
•	Eager to grow our service offering
